title: Persist Customer_Analyzer positioning block version metadata for staleness comparisons

sections.text: Add support in Sales_Accelerator to store the Customer_Analyzer positioning block identifier/version and last-updated timestamp alongside the rendered block on each account/opportunity. Expose a lightweight API/service method to fetch the latest Customer_Analyzer metadata for a given record so the UI can compare pasted/edited content against the canonical version. This ticket focuses only on the data model + retrieval plumbing needed for stale-block detection and replacement flows.
